H0.text: In the 1945 novel ‘Animal Farm’, how many commandments were originally written by Snowball. 5

H1.text: In the 1945 novel ‘Animal Farm’, how many commandments were originally written by Snowball. 3

H2.text: In the 1945 novel ‘Animal Farm’, how many commandments were originally written by Snowball. 10

H3.text: In the 1945 novel ‘Animal Farm’, how many commandments were originally written by Snowball. 7

A4.text: The animals adopt the Seven Commandments of Animalism.

A5.text: Eventually, only the seventh commandment remains.
